caption.p: (a) DPPH screening test on TLC and IC 50 values. (b) The plotted graphs of scavenging activity against the concentration of the ethanol crude extracts and ascorbic acid. A. Ascorbic acid. B. T. erecta. C. C. coronarium. D. A. vulgaris. E. T. officinale. F. H. annuus. G. C. morifolium. H. W. trilobata. I. A. conyzoides. J. V. amygdalina.
